CurrentValue.description: The most recently updated output state value
CurrentValue.label: Current Output Value

SetCurrentValue.description: Set the current output value of the actuator
SetCurrentValue.label: Set Current Value

TransitionTime.description: Move the actuator output smoothly from the current value to the target value
TransitionTime.label: Transition Time
